name: Sound Designing for John Lemon
description:
Sound Design piece for my FMOD portfolio.

We all know about the Mr. Lemon stealth game. If you ask me, it was a bit lacking in the sound department, so, using FMOD, Ableton, Microphones and my favourite soundbanks, I redesigned the sounds from the ground up in the game engine.

This time, I mostly wanted to work on creating the most oppressive atmosphere through audio elements, so there's no music at all, just layers and layers of interactive sounds that create a sonic hellscape.

I'm fully available for collabs so DM me any time !
